title: Pakistan for first time become one of five countries with most investment: Faisal Javed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 9 (APP): Chairman Senate Standing Committee on Information and Broadcasting Senator Faisal Javed Khan on Wednesday said that Pakistan for the first time
has become one of the five countries in the world with the most investment in the first half of 2020.
In a tweet, he said that a World Bank report said “Pakistan also leads South Asian Region getting ahead of India and Bangladesh”.
He termed it a good news for Pakistan.
